H0.text: What word for unthinking patriotism is derived from the name of one of Napoleon's admirers. Bonapartist

H1.text: What word for unthinking patriotism is derived from the name of one of Napoleon's admirers. Imperialist

H2.text: What word for unthinking patriotism is derived from the name of one of Napoleon's admirers. Nationalist

H3.text: What word for unthinking patriotism is derived from the name of one of Napoleon's admirers. Chauvinist

A4.text: The French term had originated in the early 1830s based on the character of Nicolas Chauvin in the play The Tricolour Cockade by the Cogniard Brothers

A5.text: According to legend, French soldier Nicolas Chauvin was badly wounded in the Napoleonic Wars and received a meager pension for his injuries
